heroSection.title: Reaching the World by Land, Sea, and Air
heroSection.subtitle: We provide logistics solutions via land, sea, and air routes, ensuring every shipment arrives on time, with the best security and service at every step.
heroSection.locationText: We reach shipments to all over the world.

visionMissionSection.heading: SHAGA IS READY TO SERVE YOU
visionMissionSection.title: We provide logistics services for timely and secure deliveries.
visionMissionSection.visionDescription: To become a global leader in the logistics industry by delivering seamless, reliable, and innovative solutions that drive success and sustainable growth for businesses worldwide.
visionMissionSection.missionDescription: We connect businesses with efficient and integrated supply chains through innovative and responsible logistics solutions that enhance operational performance, reduce costs, and drive growth in a dynamic global market.

seaShipping.content: Cost-effective solutions for large quantities of goods from the port.

landShipping.content: Efficient transportation for regional deliveries with flexible schedules.

valuesSection.heading: CORE VALUES
valuesSection.title: Built on Trust and Excellence.
valuesSection.subtitle: We build strong relationships based on integrity, quality, and accountability.

trustItem.content: We ensure every shipment meets our high standards, from start to finish.

customerCentricItem.content: Your needs are our priority at every step of the journey.

innovationItem.content: Adopting the latest technology to deliver a seamless logistics experience.

sustainabilityItem.content: Committed to environmentally friendly practices in every aspect of our service.

transformingSection.title: We bring strategic innovation in logistics to support sustainable market growth.
transformingSection.content: Transforming logistics with innovative solutions through advanced technology and data-driven strategies to increase efficiency, reduce costs, and meet the ever-evolving demands of the market.

workSection.heading: Work Process
workSection.title: Our Work Process
workSection.subtitle: Our process is simple yet effective. From the initial consultation to understand your logistics needs, to thorough planning and execution, we ensure every detail is handled with precision.

steps.title: In-depth Consultation
steps.description: Strategic assessment of your logistics needs to deliver optimal solutions tailored to your business goals.

steps.title: Strategic Planning
steps.description: Developing integrated strategies to ensure effective, efficient, and timely delivery processes.

steps.title: Efficient Execution
steps.description: Coordinating every detail of the delivery process carefully to ensure smooth and timely execution.

steps.title: On-time Delivery
steps.description: A thorough approach to your logistics needs to deliver the most effective and reliable solutions.

heroSection.title: About Shaga
heroSection.subtitle: Delivering excellence through tailored logistics solutions to drive efficiency, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

whoAreWeSection.heading: Getting to Know Us
whoAreWeSection.title: We focus on comprehensive logistics services to ensure timely and secure deliveries.
whoAreWeSection.description: Our dedicated team works tirelessly to deliver customized solutions for businesses of all sizes, helping you achieve your goals reliably and efficiently. From customs services to last-mile delivery, we are committed to quality and attention to detail in every service we provide.
whoAreWeSection.quote: We simplify the logistics process with advanced technology so you can focus on business growth

years.description: Shaga was founded with a vision to provide efficient regional logistics solutions
Expanded services to include international shipping and cross-border solutions
Opened new offices in major global trade centers, strengthening international reach
Launched our proprietary tracking technology for real-time shipment visibility
Achieved a 99% on-time delivery rate, establishing a trusted industry-leading position

gallerySection.heading: Our Fleet
gallerySection.title: Journey of Our Logistics
gallerySection.description: Take a tour of our fleet's journey, where every step is managed with precision, speed, and reliability to ensure on-time delivery and seamless logistics from start to finish.

ctaSection.title: Entrust your cargo to our team
ctaSection.description: Our experienced team ensures your cargo is handled with the utmost care, delivering safe and timely shipments at every stage of the process.

heroSection.title: Contact Shaga
heroSection.subtitle: We are ready to support your logistics needs. Contact us for inquiries, quotes, or assistance.

contactInformationSection.title: Connect with us today and we will support your business
contactInformationSection.description: Ready to take your logistics to the next level? Contact us today to learn how our tailored solutions and expertise can transform your supply chain.
contactInformationSection.formTitle: Please fill out the form below and our team will contact you shortly.

findUsSection.heading: Find Us
findUsSection.title: Strategically located for easy access to all major logistics routes

faqs.question: What logistics services does Shaga offer?
faqs.answer: Shaga offers a range of logistics services including land and sea shipping, customs services, warehousing & distribution, supply chain management, cross-border solutions, last-mile delivery, and project cargo handling.

faqs.question: How can I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking feature on our website by entering the tracking number provided when your shipment was confirmed.

faqs.question: Does Shaga provide international services?
faqs.answer: Yes, Shaga provides international logistics services including cross-border shipping and customs solutions to help businesses access global markets.

faqs.question: How can I get a quote for my logistics needs?
faqs.answer: You can contact our sales team via the contact form on our website or reach out directly by phone or email to get a customized quote for your logistics needs.

discussionCtaSection.title: Contact us to discuss how our services can support your business.
